:::::: {.columns}
::: {.column}
```{r, eval=FALSE}
customers <- rawdata[-1, ] %>%
    type_convert() %>%
    filter(is.na(term)) %>%
    left_join(cities) %>% 
    select(c(-2:-20, -33)) %>%
    rename(survey_id = V1)
```
